column5: Anyone been out for perch east of Sault Ont since ice out (Pine island area)

By east do you mean Neebish? I was there very late ice, hammered some 12-12.5''s. If you do mean Neebish, avoid going to that main channel where all the huts are always set up, work around that area though and theres some bigguns that are going to be hanging around.Good luck.
